description: Nishi`s childhood sweet-heart who has recently become engaged. Myon and Nishi lost track of one another as they grew older. Myon appears to be aware of Nishi`s crush on her when they are reunited, but is disappointed by Nishi`s lack of confidence. Myon works at her father`s yakitori restaurant with her sister. She was a swimming champion during high school, but eventually she grew up when her breasts became too big, as a consequence she could not carry on with that activity and gave up.
name: Myon
